name: Earthshakers
description: Earthshakers is an action shooting game that fights against enemies as a post-human "puppeteer" born with the ability to manipulate machines in the future world where the war between humans and machines is deepening.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i5-6600 (More than equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (More than equivalent) Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i7-6700 (More than equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (More than equivalent) Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Any
